alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Montgomery; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:09AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fountain, south central Warren and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 509 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Veedersburg, or 18 miles east of Danville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Veedersburg around 515 AM EDT. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 7 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Occasional cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
